text: Kottaram Vaidyan is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Satheesh Venganoor, starring Vineeth Kumar and Sujitha in the lead role. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/1819/malayalam/kottaram-vaidyan/index.htm ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Suraj Venjaramoodu * Baiju * Captain Raju * Maniyanpilla Raju * Jagadish as Sukumaran * Janardanan * Kanakalatha * Kochu Preman * Manka Mahesh * Monilal * Narendra Prasad * Sujitha as Shivapriya * Vineeth Kumar ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kottaram Vaidyan
